typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_company_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_company_id as integer,
		Mailing_Country as string,
		Billing_Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getCompany
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as integer,
		member_company_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getAssessor
getCompany, getAssessor join(getCompany@member_company_id == getAssessor@member_company_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> combineSet
combineSet sink(input(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as integer,
		member_company_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		salesforce_company_id = getCompany@salesforce_company_Id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> updateSalesforceCompanyIds

parameters{
	pbatch_id as integer (1)
}
source(output(
		RatingHeaderID as integer,
		RatingReferenceNumber as string,
		PremiseTypeID as integer,
		PremiseType as string,
		PremiseID as integer,
		PremiseName as string,
		AssessorID as integer,
		Assessor as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Customer as string,
		RatingPeriodFrom as timestamp,
		RatingPeriodTo as timestamp,
		PublicListingFlag as boolean,
		OfficerID as integer,
		Officer as string,
		RatingStatusID as integer,
		RatingStatus as string,
		LodgedDate as timestamp,
		PaymentStatusID as integer,
		PaymentStatus as string,
		PaidDate as timestamp,
		CertificateValidFrom as timestamp,
		CertificateValidTo as timestamp,
		PremiseNameOnCert as string,
		CustomerNameOnCert as string,
		ReplaceFlag as boolean,
		RenewFlag as boolean,
		PreviousRatingHeaderID as integer,
		NewRatingHeaderID as integer,
		StreetNumber as string,
		StreetName as string,
		Suburb as string,
		Postcode as string,
		State as string,
		Batch_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getRatings
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforcebuildingId as string,
		name as string,
		postcode as string,
		state as string,
		streetname as string,
		streetnumber as string,
		suburb as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_premise_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSalesforceBuildings
source(output(
		id as integer,
		salesforce_assessor_Id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		created_on as timestamp,
		member_assessor_id as integer,
		salesforce_company_id as integer,
		member_company_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> getLookupSalesforceAssessors
getRatings filter(equals(Batch_Id, $pbatch_id)) ~> filterBatchRatings
joinLookupSalesforceAssessors, getLookupSalesforceBuildings join(PremiseID == member_premise_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joiningAllSets
getLookupSalesforceBuildings filter(equals(batch_id,  $pbatch_id)) ~> currentBatchSFBuildings
filterBatchRatings, getLookupSalesforceAssessors join(AssessorID == member_assessor_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinLookupSalesforceAssessors
joiningAllSets sink(input(
		id as integer,
		source_rating_id as integer,
		building_type as string,
		sf_company_id as string,
		sf_building_id as string,
		batch_id as integer,
		sf_rating_id as string,
		sf_assessor_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		source_rating_id = RatingHeaderID,
		building_type = PremiseType,
		sf_building_id = salesforcebuildingId,
		batch_id = getRatings@Batch_Id,
		sf_assessor_id = salesforce_assessor_Id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dumpToSFTransofrmedRatings

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from NO_Building__c 
where Postcode__c = '@{variables('_vcurrentRatingItem')[0].Postcode}'
and State__c = '@{variables('_vcurrentRatingItem')[0].State}'
and Suburb__c = '@{variables('_vcurrentRatingItem')[0].Suburb}'
and Street_Number__c = '@{variables('_vcurrentRatingItem')[0].StreetNumber}'
and Street_Name__c = '@{variables('_vcurrentRatingItem')[0].StreetName}'
and Name = '@{variables('_vcurrentRatingItem')[0].PremiseName}'

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce').Output.value[0].Id

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce').output.value

activities.name: Lookup Each Assessor by Name In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID

query.value:
Select id from Contact
where Email= '@{activity('Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID').output.value[0].Email}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Assessor by Name In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Assessor by Name In Salesforce').output.value
@activity('Lookup Each Assessor by Name In Salesforce').output.value.Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Company by Name In Salesforce

dependsOn.activity: Get Company Details by Assessor Id

query.value:
Select id from Account
where NO_ABN__c = '@{activity('Get Company Details by Assessor Id').output.value[0].ABN}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Company by Name In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Company by Name In Salesforce').output.value
@activity('Lookup Each Company by Name In Salesforce').output.value.Id

activities.name: Get Assessor Details by Assessor ID

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select Top 1 * from AssessorsStage where AssessorId = '@{item()[0].AssessorId}'

activities.name: Get Company Details by Assessor Id

sqlReaderQuery.value: Select Top 1 * from CompanyStage where CompanyId = '@{item()[0].CompanyId}'

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from Contact
where NO_Id_In_Member__c = @{item().member_assessor_id}

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce').output.value[0].Id

activities.name: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

query.value:
Select id from NO_Building__c 
where Postcode__c = '@{variables('_vnewBuildingInSF')[0].Postcode}'
and State__c = '@{variables('_vnewBuildingInSF')[0].State}'
and Suburb__c = '@{variables('_vnewBuildingInSF')[0].Suburb}'
and Street_Number__c = '@{variables('_vnewBuildingInSF')[0].StreetNumber}'
and Street_Name__c = '@{variables('_vnewBuildingInSF')[0].StreetName}'
and Name = '@{variables('_vnewBuildingInSF')[0].PremiseName}'

dependsOn.activity: Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce

value.value: @activity('Lookup Each Building by Name In Salesforce').output.value
